mapper.sql: id, order_no, warehouse_name, area_name, shelves_name, old_location_code, new_location_code, sku, number, status, create_user, create_time, remarks
mapper.select:
select id, order_no orderNo, warehouse_name warehouseName, area_name areaName, shelves_name shelvesName, old_location_code oldLocationCode, new_location_code newLocationCode, sku, number, status, create_user, create_time, remarks from relocation_record r
status = 1
and r.order_no like concat('%',#{form.orderNo},'%')
and r.warehouseName like concat('%',#{form.warehouseName},'%')
and r.shelvesName like concat('%',#{form.shelvesName},'%')
and r.areaName like concat('%',#{form.areaName},'%')
and r.sku like concat('%',#{form.sku},'%')
and r.create_time >= #{form.startTime}
and r.create_time <= #{form.endTime}
